Module org.microbean.type
Package org.microbean.type

Class Type.CovariantSemantics

java.lang.Object
org.microbean.type.Type.Semantics
org.microbean.type.Type.VariantSemantics
org.microbean.type.Type.CovariantSemantics
Enclosing class:
Type<T>
@Experimental public static class Type.CovariantSemantics extends Type.VariantSemantics
A Type.VariantSemantics implementation that implements Java type assignability semantics, which are covariant.
Author:
Laird Nelson

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final Type.CovariantSemantics
    INSTANCE
    A convenient instance of Type.CovariantSemantics.

    Creates a new Type.CovariantSemantics.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    protected final <X, Y> boolean
    classIsAssignableFromGenericArrayType(Type<X> receiverClass, Type<Y> payloadGenericArrayType)
    Returns true if and only if a reference bearing the type modeled by the supplied payloadGenericArrayType is assignable to a reference bearing the type modeled by the supplied receiverClass, according to the assignability rules modeled by this Type.Semantics instance, and if and only if payloadGenericArrayType models a Java generic array type and not any other type, and if and only if receiverClass models a Java class and not any other type.
    protected <X, Y> boolean
    classIsAssignableFromParameterizedType(Type<X> receiverClass, Type<Y> payloadParameterizedType)
    Returns true if and only if a reference bearing the type modeled by the supplied payloadClass is assignable to a reference bearing the type modeled by the supplied receiverClass, according to the assignability rules modeled by this Type.Semantics instance, and if and only if payloadParameterizedType models a Java parameterized type and not any other type, and if and only if receiverClass models a Java class and not any other type.
    protected final <X, Y> boolean
    classIsAssignableFromTypeVariable(Type<X> receiverType, Type<Y> payloadType)
    Returns true if and only if a reference bearing the type modeled by the supplied payloadTypeVariable is assignable to a reference bearing the type modeled by the supplied receiverClass, according to the assignability rules modeled by this Type.Semantics instance, and if and only if payloadTypeVariable models a Java type variable and not any other type, and if and only if receiverClass models a Java class and not any other type.
    protected final <X, Y> boolean
    genericArrayTypeIsAssignableFromClass(Type<X> receiverGenericArrayType, Type<Y> payloadClass)
    Returns true if and only if a reference bearing the type modeled by the supplied payloadClass is assignable to a reference bearing the type modeled by the supplied receiverGenericArrayType, according to the assignability rules modeled by this Type.Semantics instance, and if and only if payloadClass models a Java class and not any other type, and if and only if receiverGenericArrayType models a generic array type and not any other type.
    protected <X, Y> boolean
    parameterizedTypeIsAssignableFromClass(Type<X> receiverParameterizedType, Type<Y> payloadClass)

  • Method Details

    • classIsAssignableFromParameterizedType

      protected <X, Y> boolean classIsAssignableFromParameterizedType(Type<X> receiverClass, Type<Y> payloadParameterizedType)
      Description copied from class: Type.Semantics
      Returns true if and only if a reference bearing the type modeled by the supplied payloadClass is assignable to a reference bearing the type modeled by the supplied receiverClass, according to the assignability rules modeled by this Type.Semantics instance, and if and only if payloadParameterizedType models a Java parameterized type and not any other type, and if and only if receiverClass models a Java class and not any other type.

      This method is called by the Type.Semantics.assignable(Type, Type) method.

      This implementation returns false in all cases.

      Overrides:
      classIsAssignableFromParameterizedType in class Type.Semantics
      Type Parameters:
      X - the kind of type modeled by the receiverClass; often a java.lang.reflect.Type
      Y - the kind of type modeled by the payloadParameterizedType; often a java.lang.reflect.Type
      Parameters:
      receiverClass - the receiver type as described above; must not be null
      payloadParameterizedType - the payload type as described above; must not be null
      Returns:
      false in all cases
      See Also:
      • Type.Semantics.assignable(Type, Type)

      protected final <X, Y> boolean wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromClass(Type<X> receiverWildcardType, boolean lowerBounded, Type<Y> payloadClass)
      Description copied from class: Type.Semantics
      Returns true if and only if a reference bearing the type modeled by the supplied payloadClass is assignable to a reference bearing the type modeled by the supplied receiverWildcardType, according to the assignability rules modeled by this Type.Semantics instance, and if and only if payloadClass models a Java class and not any other type, and if and only if receiverWildcardType models a wildcard type and not any other type.

      This method is called by the Type.Semantics.assignable(Type, Type) method.

      This implementation returns false in all cases.

      Overrides:
      wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromClass in class Type.Semantics
      Type Parameters:
      X - the kind of type modeled by the receiverWildcardType; often a java.lang.reflect.Type
      Y - the kind of type modeled by the payloadClass; often a java.lang.reflect.Type
      Parameters:
      receiverWildcardType - the receiver type as described above; must not be null
      lowerBounded - whether receiverWildcardType is a lower-bounded wildcard type
      payloadClass - the payload type as described above; must not be null
      Returns:
      false in all cases
      See Also:
      • Type.Semantics.assignable(Type, Type)
